column2:
"/ci1 1 You can tell me to hurry up all you like, but those things won't get any weaker...!
Waaaaaah!"
"/ci1 2 This is really it, isn't it? The Professor and I will do our best to get their attention. Good luck, both of you!"

"Professor...?!
I don't think I can do this by myself, but I'll give it my best shot!"
